meanings.definition: Covered in or resembling a thin layer of film.
meanings.sent1: The window was the filmiest after the rain.
meanings.sent2: Her dress was the filmiest fabric I had ever seen.
meanings.sent3: The cake was so moist that it felt filmiest to the touch.
meanings.sent4: The mist in the forest made the air feel filmiest, like a dream.
meanings.sent5: The fog was so thick it draped the town in the filmiest veil.

meanings.definition: Having the qualities or characteristics of a film.
meanings.sent1: The actors' costumes were the filmiest part of the play.
meanings.sent2: The sunset painted the sky in the filmiest hues.
meanings.sent3: The cat's attempt at sneaking up on the bird was the filmiest action.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of fresh popcorn in the cinema was the filmiest scent.
meanings.sent5: The music playing in the background set the filmiest mood for the evening.
